price: 4. (Alle) baa iska leh waxa ku sugan samooyinka iyo waxa ku sugan arlada. Waana Sarreeyaha, Weyn.
arabic: لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿaliyu al-ʿaẓīmu
